    • openAuction

      void openAuction(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Opens the main auction GUI for a player

      Opens a player's listed items GUI
      Parameters:
      player - The player to view their items

    • addAuctionItem

      CompletableFuture<Boolean> addAuctionItem(org.bukkit.entity.Player seller, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, double price)
      Adds a new item to the auction
      Parameters:
      seller - The player selling the item
      item - The item stack to auction
      price - The selling price
      Returns:
      Future that completes with true if successful

      Returns:
      Future that completes with true if successful

      Returns:
